Kashira:
Keisei (傾城)

Category: Female

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Gion Festival (Gion sairei shinkōki / 祇園祭礼信仰記)

The Shiraishi Story (Go taiheiki shiraishi banashi / 碁太平記白石噺)

The Vendetta in Iga (Iga-goe dōchū sugoroku / 伊賀越道中双六)

The Adachi Plain in Oshu (Ōshu Adachigahara / 奥州安達原)

The Battle of Dannoura (Dannoura kabuto gunki / 壇浦兜軍記)

The Courtesan Yugiri (Yūgiri Awa no Naruto / 夕霧阿波鳴渡)

The Romance in the Gay Quarters (Kuruwa bunshō / 曲輪ぶんしょう)

The Nine-Tailed Fox (Tamamo no mae asahi no tamoto / 玉藻前曦袂)

The Story of Kasane (Meiboku kasane monogatari / 薫樹累物語)

The Story of the Morning Glory (Shōutsushi asagao banashi / 生写朝顔話)
